content.rendered:
A meet and greet activity was conducted at the PepsiCo. plant for children of Smile Foundation in Mumbai on the 25th of November 2017. A painting competition was conducted for the children and prizes were distributed to the children. The children also showed their talent by singing & dancing during the activity and employees from PepsiCo. also joined them. The kids from the Mission Education centre also got a chance to visit the PepsiCo. plant and learnt a lot of new things by observing the making of various products. The day was very enjoyable and fun filled for kids.

Mission Education is a national level programme of Smile Foundation, which is committed to providing basic education and healthcare to underprivileged children.

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 600,000 children and their families every year, through more than 250 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 950 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
